definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: recount, relate (prob. ancient denom. from [[סֵפֶר]]; NH = BH; Eth. safara measure Di:404);—

count things, to learn their number, c. acc., Ge 15:5, Ge 15:5 (J) 2Sa 24:10 + 10 t. (+ acc. cogn. 2Ch 2:16); acc. om. Ge 41:49 (E); + [[ל]] (dat. comm. vel eth.), Le 15:13, Le 15:28, Le 23:15, Le 25:8 (all PH), De 16:9, Ez Eze 44:26, Ezr 1:8, Ps 87:6, Is 33:8 (abs.), v:Is 33:18 (but text suspicious, conjj. in Du Che:Hpt).

number = take account of, carefully observe and consider, reckon: [[חְעָדַי תִּסְפּוֹר]] Job 14:16 of my steps thou takest account, so Job 31:4; v. also Job 38:37 (cf. supr.); [[נׁדִי סָפַרַתַּה]] Ps 56:9 my wandering hast thou reckoned, taken into account (Che reads [[סִפַּרְתִּי]] after LXX).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִסָּפֵר]] Ho 2:1 + 4 t.; 3 mpl. [[יִסָּֽפְרוּ]] 1Ki 8:5, 2Ch 5:6, [[וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ]] 1Ch 23:3; —be counted, numbered usu. c. neg., to indicate multitude, [[מֵרׂב]] ´[[לאׁ יִסּ]] Ge 16:10 (J) it is not to be counted, for multitude,  so Ge 32:13 (J), 1Ki 3:8 (‖[[יִמָּנֶה לאׁ]]), 1Ki 8:5 (+ id.), 2Ch 5:6 (+ id.); cf. Ho 2:1 (+ [[יִמַּד לאׁ־]]), Je 33:22 (‖[[לאׁ יִמַּד]]); positively, only [[וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ]] [[הַלְּוִיִּם]] 1Ch 23:3.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: :67 Pf. 1 s. [[סִפַּ֫רְתִּי]] Ps 119:26, [[סִפַָּרְתִּי]] v:Ps 119:13; 3 pl. [[סִפְּרוּ]] Ju Jdg 6:13 + 3 t.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְסַפֵּר]] Job 38:37 +, 1 s. [[אֲסַפֵּר]] Ps 22:18 +; cohort. [[אֲסַפֵָּרָה]] Job 15:7; 1 pl. [[וַנְּסַפֶּר־]] Ex 10:2, etc.; Imv. [[סַפֵּר]] Is 43:26, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[סַפֵּר]] ([[לְ]]) Ps 50:16 + 5 t.; Pt. [[מְסַפֵּר]] Ju Jdg 7:13, 2Ki 8:5; pl. [[מְסַפְּרִים]] Ps 19:2, Ps 78:4; —recount, rehearse, declare:

recount something (acc.) to ([[לְ]] pers.) Ju Jdg 6:13, Jdg 7:13, Ge 24:66 (J), 1Sa 11:5 + 18 t. (of rehearsing glorious deeds of ´[[י]] Ps 44:2, Ps 73:28, Ps 78:3, Ps 78:4, Ps 79:13); c. acc. + [[בְּ]] loc. Ez Eze 12:16, elsewhere of rehearsing name or praise of ´[[י]] Ex 9:16 (J) Ps 9:15, Ps 96:3 = 1Ch 16:24, Ps 102:22, Je 51:10; c. acc. alone Ps 9:2, Ps 19:2, Ps 119:13 (+ [[בְּ]] instr.), Ps 145:6 + 8 t. PsalmPsalm + Is 43:21, all of rehearsing praise of ´[[י]]; cf. [[עָֽחְמוּ מִסַּפֵּר]] Ps 40:6 they are too great to rehearse c. acc. also Je 23:28, Je 23:32, Job 15:17, Job 28:27, Ps 119:26; acc. om. Is 43:26, c. [[לְ]] pers. Ge 40:8 (E) + 6 t., c. [[אֶל־]] pers. Ge 37:10 (E), c. [[בְּאָזְנֵי]] Ex 10:2; c. [[כְּמוֹ]] (q.v.) Ps 73:15; c. [[אֶל־]] concerning Ps 2:7, cf. Ps 69:27 ( LXX SyrVer Ew Ol Gr Bi Che Bae add; in that case read [[יׁסִָפוּ]]); c. [[עַל־]] concerning + [[לְ]] pers. Joe 1:3.
appar., in weakened sense, talk Ps 59:13, Ps 64:6 (c. [[ל]] concerning), Ps 73:15 (c. [[כְּמוֹ]]).
count exactly, accurately [[אֲסַפֵּר כָּל־עַחְמוֹתָָי]] Ps 22:18 I can count exactly all my bones (in wasted body).—Ps 40:6 v. sub

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: be recounted, related, rehearsed: Pf. 3 ms. [[סֻפַּר לְ]] Is 52:15; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְסֻפַּר לְ]] Job 37:20 (cl. as subj.), + [[לְ]] concerning Ps 22:31; c. [[בְּ]] loc. Ps 88:12; abs. [[יְסֻפָָּר]] Hb Hab 1:5.
